meta-review.comment: Rise of the Tomb Raider takes players on a rollicking adventure filled with smart puzzles, versatile combat, and stunning vistas. Lara's daredevil sequences and heroic moments rival even Indiana Jones, making this game a blast to play. The game excels in blending combat, exploration, and puzzle-solving, delivering a well-paced and unforgettable experience. With a character that resonates like no other, Rise of the Tomb Raider sets a high bar for adventurers of the future.
